# Test Fixtures

This directory will contain test media files for integration testing.

## Structure

```
fixtures/
├── movies/
│   ├── movie.2023.1080p.mkv (sample)
│   └── Another.Movie.2022.720p.mp4 (sample)
├── tv/
│   ├── show.s01e01.mkv (sample)
│   └── series.1x02.mp4 (sample)
├── music/
│   └── Artist - Album/01 - Song.mp3 (sample)
└── books/
    └── Book.Title.epub (sample)
```

Small sample files will be created for testing purposes.
